website_summaries.verdict: Despite the subpar zippers, this affordable bag fits the needs of most makeup enthusiasts, as the design is crafted for organization.
pros: We love this bag's superior design with ample compartments
Handy dividers can be adjusted to customize individual storage needs
cons: Some larger items like palettes may not fit in some of the compartments, no matter how you adjust them
Zippers have been known to stick or break

customer_reviews.title: The bag is sturdy, protects all your products
customer_reviews.text: It was a steal! I've owned a ton of make up bags over the years, but i will keep using this one. The bag is sturdy, protects all your products. The organizers are really helpful! There is a section just for your brushes and a flap that separates them from your products keeping them clean. This case has stayed clean unlike all my other previous makeup bags where products would spill. I would definately recommend the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment of ever got. Get the bigger one though. Unless you want to use the small one for your main make up and the bigger one for everything else. That's what I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: This makeup bag is exactly what I’ve been looking for !!! It’s hard exterior protects my makeup, the adjustable dividers allow for multiple uses, my brushes are protected from getting dirty and the zipper pocket is big enough to hold my palettes. It’s very durable, not too bulky, and the handle makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: kendall young

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been looking for. Easy to compartmentalize your makeup. It's the perfect size. It takes a little reorganizing, but I got everything in there.
customer_reviews.author: Reynold Wang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! I stuffed it and it closed very well. It seems durable, it doesn’t look like it’ll bust a seam or the zipper will break - which I’ve had happen with other makeup cases I’ve ordered. Glad I went without the smaller, it was perfect size for my needs. Love that it has a spot for brushes so I don’t have to have a separate case for brushes. I also love that you can change the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Your makeup will fit!😍
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can move the slides anyway I like to accommodate product. As seen I have A LOT OF PRODUCT in this case AND IT CLOSES!! Definitely going to buy a few more for my friends!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA REYES

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Portable Office
customer_reviews.text: I am a jewelry designer/crafter, and needed something as my "office" box when doing festivals and art shows. This was the perfect solution - compartments to hold clips, pens, velcro straps, push pins, hooks, scissors, cards, etc. - everything that comes in handy when setting up my booth. It's compact, easy to pack in my crates, and the ideal solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hedgecock

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy. Was looking for something to put my makeup and it fit. I dont have much makeup, but i really liked it. Thinking of buying another one to put my electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this makeup box! I bought it to go on a trip to Mexico I didn't want to risk my makeup breaking in my suitcase. This makeup bag got the job done, I liked that you can adjust the compartments to fit your makeup. The makeup brush holder is perfect enough space to take at least 10 brushes I like the little zipper behind the makeup brushes I was able to put Q-tips cotton pads hair ties and bobby pins. I received alot of complements I highly recommend if you like to keep your makeup safe!
customer_reviews.author: Cata

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, dollar store quality
customer_reviews.text: Toxic chemical odor and poor design, smells like recycled tires and smell never dissipates regardless of how long you air it. Most likely cheap and toxic materials/chemicals used to make the product. If you google why products made in China have such terrible smell you will realize that cheap, comes with a terrible price. Not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Madalena Mansinho

customer_reviews.title: Decent size but hard to organize
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help organize my growing makeup and skin care collection. The brush area works great and I can see all the brushes and pick what I want. I struggle a bit with the compartments as the dividers have a tendency to fall on their own, allowing the contents to mix together. Does work well for travel though, seems to keep everything very safe and can fit a lot of supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY DIVIDERS
customer_reviews.text: THE dividers in the case are useless so don't buy this product if dividing your items is important which it was to me: I wanted to separate lipsticks from eyeshadows, from brushes, etc. But, the item is made so poorly that the grooves that the dividers are to slip into are useless because they are not deep enough and so when you slide the spongy like divides into the groves, they just come out as you travel and all the items commingle together. LOOK for another item and skip this if you want separate compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The product is SO MUCH SMALLER than pictured. It arrived two days late, to begin with, but when it finally arrived, I didn't even notice the package because it was so small. I thought it had to be a mistake, but nope. It was mine. I can't even fit one average size eye shadow palette in it. It's so not worth the amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked the compartments..But zipper broke 1st time I zipped it..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This makeup case is perfect for easy access to all of my makeup. You can remove the dividers to keep your makeup organized the way you want. It is very sturdy and well made so it will protect your makeup when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Travel Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is by far my favorite travel bag for makeup. I'm not one to pack light when it comes to makeup and this is perfect for me. I like that the compartments are easily moved and adjusted. I also like that my makeup brushes fit nicely under the flap but I will say that I don't like that it squishes my bigger brushes but I usually will just put them in one of the main compartments. I definitely recommend this makeup case.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gambino

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... it's small and compact. Not a good concept for a traveling artist.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Will not close!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a joke. The case doesn't even close if you put anything in the compartments of the lid.The adjustable pieces are glorified cardboard with a foam wrapping. It smells like gasoline and chemicals. Wish I could give it 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Adesa

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: This make up bag has made my mornings so much easier! No more stressing about where my eyebrow pencil is or where my eye shadow brush went or where my tweezers are! Everything has a perfect spot with this organizer. You can move the dividers as you please and the slots for make up brushes are large enough that you can fit multiple brushes in one. Everything is so clean and tidy- no gross loose powder scattered at the bottom, no foundation or mascara on your hands after digging around a deep bag! This is a must have for any woman who loves makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Dividers come loose sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case, but some of the dividers won't stay in place. I may just glue them in, as I have no intention of moving them around.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi B

customer_reviews.title: Travelling MUA +++
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CASE. I don't typically write all in caps, but this case was perfect for travelling MUA work at a dance competition. Fit in a suitcase, the adjustment of the internal compartments is easy and secure, and the outer shell of the case is hardwearing. I fit all of the supplies I needed for my work in this case (I held all of my lip and eye pencils in the "brush" spot, I keep all of my brushes and applicators in their own case). It was perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steven

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Uuhh no. It get's very dirty, and the fabric on the outside AND inside ripped pretty much the same day. I went to Ross and bought a big bag for $9 and its held up for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Strain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Large enough to fit all my makeup and brushes, but if you have a TON of makeup then I’d suggest you buy something larger. Comes with plenty of dividers, and you can customize the sizes of each compartment to fit your items. This feels very sturdy and the material and zippers feel very quality. I am very happy with this item and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schock

customer_reviews.title: A must for traveling with makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these now one for myself, my daughter and my mother in law. It keeps my brushes protected and makes traveling with compact easier. This is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Mrs.,but Mr. Ballard too.

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Exactly what I pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! It’s exactly as shown in photo not to bug or to small decent size definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this bag was atrocious, like someone washed it with ripe towels! I did not like that the space is limited for two to three eye shadow palettes, I have about 6 I received as gifts. They don’t all fit with all my other stuff. The material is stiff and the dividers do not stay in place, they are foam pieces - in mine they were bent and no longer functional. Sent back to distributor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable. I like that the zipper is thick and sturdy. The inserts are easy to remove and place where you want them to customize the size of the inside panels. The brush pockets give you plenty of room. I love this one for travel. I have the larger one for all of my makeup at home but I use this one for on-the-go. Totally worth the money. I got the black so that stains and scuffs don't show. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE CLAY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after having this make up case a week.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley g.

customer_reviews.title: You Won’t Regret Buying This!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!!!!! Perfect for traveling. Fit in my suitcase so easily. Nice square shape. Easy to use. Fits all of my makeup and I have a lot! Would recommend this to anyone for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Jayy Doll

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/Durable Exterior, Problematic Adjustable Dividers
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy exterior. Laid out well inside. Nice to not have to dig & fish blindly for items in the old, traditional, one pouch cosmetic bag that I’ve used for years. Adjustable dividers don’t stay in place, though. They don’t snap in, but rather slide into grooves that aren’t tight, causing the dividers to dislodge & annoyingly shift. Putting anything in the pocket behind the brushes will add significant bulk to the lid, making it difficult to zipper the case closed. Overall, if you have a modest amount of makeup & accessories, I’d recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Make-Up Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect for me. I took one of the dividers put to create a spot for all 3 of my Z palettes and one Tarte pallet, plus a Buxom pallet on its side. It holds all my loose eye shadows, brushes, cheek colors, liners, mascara, foundation. I keep lip colors in a separate case. It is well made, compact and much less clunky than my train case. For what I needed, it’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was better
customer_reviews.text: The dividers take up a lot of space - the pocket and/or sleeve cannot be used if the dividers are in the bottom portion as they compete for space.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for travel
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have that many cosmetics, so it is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy makeup organizer/case
customer_reviews.text: I did not actually buy this for travel. I bought it for holding my makeup all the time. That said I don’t own a lot of makeup so it is perfect to hold my entire collection. I basically have one of everything (except lipstick- I have three of those) so there is plenty of extra room to add lotions and travel shampoo, etc. when I actually travel. The only item I have a little trouble maneuvering into a slot is the eyelash curler. Otherwise it’s pretty perfect. There are enough sections to keep like-items organized and it lays open neatly when I am ready to use the contents and throw some dazzle onto my visage.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy McPeanuts

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It holds all of my makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It holds all of my makeup, and keeps my powders/shadows secure so they dont break. The spot for the brushes is key, and keeps the brushes from being damaged and transferring product. I would recommend and purchase this product for friends and family. I have had it for about a month now, and it's wearing and holding up very nicely - even with traveling, it doesn't take up too much space in my luggage, and still provides great protection to my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling, nice quality,should fully prevent any damage to mayup. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to use it for my collection of cosmetics I keep getting from my ipsy bag subscription. I think it will be great for that but I'll just have to set it somewhere, its more for traveling I think,would be awesome for that purpose. It's very sturdy,nothing can get damaged in this. It has a hard plastic shell that sets inside the case tightly with a thick foam inside the plastic shell and the same thick foam dividers that are inner changeable, nice safe case for anything collectable or fragile, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Not as functional as desired.
customer_reviews.text: This just isn’t as practical as I’d hope. I like the concept but feel it would have been better to provide movable inserts so this caddy can be configured to match the type of make you use. My foundation which is liquid does not fit in any compartment, nor does my press powder and I own 2 different foundations and press powder that spans 3 different brands. Also eye pencils, long tubes lipgloss or brow pencils don’t fit in the compartments. I like the idea but think the style needs work. I would not take this for travel and at the point I use this at home I prefer to stick with my makeup brushes and open top caddy
customer_reviews.author: Mama-to-a-Gem

customer_reviews.title: Interior Height measures 3"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold my husband's medicines. I thought the height would be ample; however, the brush holder and rigidity of construction make it impossible to stand the bottles upright. I know a techy guy who will love this for his cords, chargers, usb drives, etc. I gave it 4 stars, because I am sure those using it as a make up case will find it handy. The removable partitions are sturdy and versatile. I've heard make up artists prefer black, but I would prefer something a little more decorative for personal use. For travel it would take up too much room in compact luggage where space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: tandw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size (Medium) but it weighs as much as a small continent!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this make-up case-it organized all my make-up and was a perfect size. It would survive being dragged behind the sled during the entire Iditarod however it's so heavy, it would take double the dogs just to move it! The size would fit perfectly in a suitcase but one would have to pay extra $$$ in baggage fees. If you plan to keep this case at home, then it would suit its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne P. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: More than it seems.
customer_reviews.text: Even the small size is bigger than I expected. I don't have tons of makeup... so this seems a little excessive for me. But it is also nice because it leave extra room for other bathroom products that are needed while traveling. I definitely like how there are compartments... makes it look a lot more organized. The brush compartments are practically useless because if you put brushed in them, it makes the case super bulky. The case itself is pretty boring and looks like a lunch box. Overall, it is definitely practical and gets the job done. Just a little big and boring.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Travel Make-Up Train Case
customer_reviews.text: I use this case when I travel. It’s compact & fits in my luggage well. Case has lots of little pockets & storage for your cosmetics. I don’t wear a lot of makeup & works for my needs. There is one bigger than this one if you need more room. Product it well made, sturdy for traveling. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane MacFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. The sectional pieces don’t fit. It’s either too small for the piece or too wide. There’s no in between and once you get everything settled, if the bag is shifted in the slightest bit, the pieces pop and your make up is all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality, dividers are garbage
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and quality of this case, it’s the perfect size for my makeup. The only thing I don’t love about it are the dividers, which do not fit into the grooves, due to the foam being glued all the way up to the edge of the divider. I had to cut away some of the foam to get it to fit into the grooves.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Erin Wells

customer_reviews.title: An Organized Makeup Bag gives me life!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this makeup bag to replace my 8 year old caboodles tote which is just completely worn out and old. (But, 8 years is a long time for a makeup bag.) I absolutely love this one! Everything has a place, it's very sturdy, and plenty of strength for shock absorption from a drop or something so your makeup doesn't get damaged. It's also the perfect size for me. I do my makeup in the car everyday, so I need something small, strong, and sturdy; and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Strong but small
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packaged... Looks and feels very strong... However it's small... Would work for someone with a small amount of makup but otherwise it's a no... I'm a beautician so I'll keep it for when im travelling with jus some of my makeup... it also doesn't do well with closing when you pack stuff in the top compartments which is a bummer... As I said the quality is good to I would definitely but again in bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Way too big / bulky to be lugging around for travels, but good as a storage box
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a semi-portable make-up box that I could take around with me when traveling and on business without having to check a separate luggage. Unfortunately, this was not it. The box is way too large and inconvenient to pack in my carry-on (too big to fit in a normal-sized purse without being the only thing in that purse). That said, the quality is solid and I see it holding up over many years, so I've relegated it to a make-up storage box that I keep at home and store all my makeup tools in instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best makeup case I’ve bought!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be sure to use this for a bit before leaving a review. This case is super rugged, very sturdy and roomy. I am able to put in pretty much every item of makeup and makeup related product in this tote. Not that I have TONS because I do not. But it carries a lot is my point! Holds your brushes nicely also. I would definitely recommend this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy yost

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Too large to fit in suit case. Not good for traveling and want to pack it in your case.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like a cheap lunchbox.
customer_reviews.text: My opinion: This thing looks exactly like a school lunchbox. It is not attractive in any way, it’s quite heavy for it’s size, and is very thick. It would take up a lot of room in your luggage, but I imagine the makeup inside would be well-protected from damage during travel. It really doesn’t hold much at all, even with all the dividers removed. I will keep it for now, but would never repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent makeup bag. Its hard sides make it perfect for protecting everything in your makeup collection but also keeping organized. I love that the dividers can be moved around and removed as needed to accommodate everything. I have been using this as a daily makeup organizer for several months and I will never go back to anything else. I bought this as gifts for friends and family for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect! I was looking into train cases and caboodles just to keep my makeup in on the daily instead of having it all scattered between soft makeup bags and such and this is PERFECT! I love that the case is hard and has so many compartments + the space for brushes on the top. In the zippered bit behind the brushes, I can fit two naked palettes. I can basically fit all of my normal go-tos in here and it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Siri Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but doesn’t fit it all
customer_reviews.text: It’s very neatly setup but some items won’t fit in the even when I set it laying down, so I have to use another makeup bag for a few items. When putting brushes in the top section, you cannot close the makeup bag so I definitely did not like that feature. It’s sturdy for sure but I wish it was bigger so it could fit all my items instead of me having to use another makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Narisa Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of rummaging through my makeup bag to find what I wanted t use. This was great for me. I can see everything at a glance . It's big enough to hold everything except my eye shadow palette and yet is small enough to fit under my sink in a narrow cupboard. I only have 11 brushes and 7 pencil/wand items. They fit very well in the brush compartment which is divided into sections.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda R. Pyke

customer_reviews.title: Inner parts are not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The case is very nice and great for traveling as all the product is in one place but the partitions are not very study. 2 months after using the have moved and defeats the purpose of organization.
customer_reviews.author: Slimgoody

customer_reviews.title: Great case but dividers don’t hold their position
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this makeup case so badly but the dividers will not stay in place for me. The notches that connect the dividers are already misshapen and do not hold. The rest of the case is great but I bought it for the dividers and they aren’t working well.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are a man, this is a waste of money. Doesn't fit makeup brushes unless you purchase chintsy, crappy ones. NONE of my moisturizers fit - EVEN IN MY TRAVEL FRIENDLY CONTAINERS!!!!!. AND this stupid bag is heavy without ANYTHING IN IT!!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!! Go to the Container Store and buy one of their makeup bags or Target.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Schertler

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2. One for travel and the larger one for home.
customer_reviews.text: What was I thinking? I spent years buying flimsy bags and having to scramble through them looking for my stuff in hotel rooms. This bag is remarkable. A place for everything, and everything in its place. Finally!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Z.

customer_reviews.title: does not like the color
customer_reviews.text: was a gift , likes it. does not like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is smaller than what I had imagined, but I didn't realize it was 'for travel'. If you do use it for travel, I think it is the perfect size. I love that this organizer has the adjustable dividers and you can customize the fit according to your products. I plan to use this bag as a first-aid/beauty kit. I am going to try and fit everything I need in this bag and then post an update. So far its a nice sturdy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Makes my makeup routine so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this. I literally used to keep all my makeup on a ziploc bag and would have to rummage around to find what I needed when I would do my makeup, taking up time. This makes my whole makeup routine process 100x easier. Everything is organized how I like it (eg. foundations, eye makeup, lip products, etc). I told my sister how much I loved it and convinced her to buy it, and she fell in love too!
customer_reviews.author: Branda

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Train Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an upcoming trip and it fits my needs perfectly. The material is forgiving and easily surface washable but the product itself is very durable and sturdy. There is more than enough room for the makeup and related accessories I plan to bring with me. I am fully confident everything will stay safe and well-organized throughout the duration of my holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great to organize more than makeup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my makeup. Unfortunately it just doesn’t work for that application for me. My stuff is too big & doesn’t fit nicely. However i still love this bag and will be ordering more in the future. Great for organizing and compact storage. We are using is as an emergency medical kit for our boat and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Moser

customer_reviews.title: Best travel case ever
customer_reviews.text: I take my make-up to the gym to get ready and this case is the best. It's sturdy enough so nothing gets crushed or tossed about. There are nice pouches to keep my brushed from getting smooshed or contaminated, and lots of adjustable bays to separate your different size/type items. Fits great in my backpack. Hands down the best make-up travel bag/trunk I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my makeup, not all of it, just the basics I’ll sometimes throw on before work. I can’t fit much of anything on the slots, no matter how odd I arrange them. It’s good for just one type of thing- like all individual eyeshadows or eyeliner, but for packing an entire face in, it just won’t do. Very high quality though!
customer_reviews.author: Mianna Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional travel
customer_reviews.text: Overall this isn’t a bad purchase to have available for occasional travel. I have now used it on 6 different trips and it’s worked out well. It has space for a lot of items and the dividers make the compartment sizes adjustable. The only negative is that once you start moving the dividers I’ve found they don’t stay in place well or at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect for traveling or even just storing your makeup. I use it for both, I love that the outside doesn’t bend it’s nice and sturdy. All of my everyday makeup and some toiletries fix in this. I took most dividers out just for extra room but I love that you can take them out and put them in as you please.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great case and professional looking
customer_reviews.text: Great case and professional looking. I use it for when I need to take my makeup to work with me but ended up just using it everyday on my counter
customer_reviews.author: MizzRoxie

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize some of my skin care products. It gives you the ability to organize all different size products and prevents your items from getting shuffled around. I absolutely love this case! Definitely going to be buying a second one for my makeup products and possibly a third for miscellaneous beauty products!
customer_reviews.author: Snp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally saw this case and it caught my interest. I am SO GLAD that I bought it! It hold everything! I have all of my travel toiletries along with makeup and brushes packed away in this tidy little case. The adjustable compartments are so helpful and I love the spots for my makeup brushes! The extra zipper pocket hold more than you would think as well. It keeps everything organized and is super sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Logo is a no go
customer_reviews.text: I have a large one of these and bought nine small ones for my bridesmaids as a gift. I order the first one separately so I knew I liked the size. The first one didn’t have a logo on it when it arrived. I ordered the remaining 8 and they all came with a weird logo that is not pictured in the product photos. This was a little upsetting but other than that I think it’s the perfect travel size and it looks nice for a makeup bag. You can keep super organized and you can make the inside compartments the size you want by moving the dividers. I would buy again but would hope for no random logo.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Too small....
customer_reviews.text: Good for small items like lipsticks, compact powder, short pencils. Smaller than a morphe 35o palette which doesn’t fit even when you take out the compartment holders. Honestly I would definitely recommend this for holding hair ties and scrunches and Bobby pins and 1 medium sized hairbrushes. Sorry for no pic. But that is why I give it a 3 star for makeup holding but a 4.5 star for hair clips and accessories. It’s very sturdy and well stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Becky4rmwoods

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality and durability of this case (and it’s zippers) is great. I love the removable inserts that allow you change the positioning or remove any that you don’t need. I use this to store my nail dip accessories and dip colors and, although I’ll soom outgrow it as I buy more colors, it’s still a great bag and I’m sure I’ll find other uses for it once it won’t fit all my dip colors.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Fits a bunch of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing. The dividers come out and you can rearrange them to fit stuff. I use it because I travel a lot and now instead of picking what I will or won’t use I just take the whole damn thing with me and it’s compact size so not a headache at all. I fit all my makeup in here (ide say I’m average, not a ton of makeup but definetly not little), I have like 3 foundations and several powders at least six eyeshadow things, all my brushes. You can fit a bunch of crap in here if you organize it good. Quality is good Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charmalarm

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy design, and I love that I can customize ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy design, and I love that I can customize the compartments. I use this for makeup storage, and it's perfect. After seeing mine, my mom bought one, too, and she loves it just as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Ciji

customer_reviews.title: Practically Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can get my mess of a makeup drawer under control & organized. I like the space, the sturdiness, the compartments. The only thing that would have bumped this to a 5 star is if it came with little dividers to put in the "grooves" in each compartment and/or tiny plastic boxes or zip pouches to take with you on the fly if you don't want to bring the entire makeup stash that day. Other than that it's a great product and I'm excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JamieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife as we have an upcoming trip and figured she could use something to pack away all of her favorite makeup she gets in boxycharm and ulta vs just throwing everything into her luggage. I was surprised when I opened the package to find this is a very well made bag with its fabric over a plastic hard case which is very sturdy. Also very good customization for size due to the moving compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Holly

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for storing all of my makeup. I used to have makeup in 3 different bags, but I can fit it all in this one with no issues. You can use the dividers to adjust the length and width of each little pocket to coincide with what kind of makeup you have, there is a spot for brushes, and another zipper pocket in the lid. It is very sturdy and easy to close and carry. I have not traveled with it yet, but I don't think there will be a problem with I do. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup case I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup case I have ever used. It’s perfect. It holds everything in an organized way. It’s durable, travels well, and is nice looking. I have spent far more for train cases which are not a modem solution to protect the expensive makeup products that I use. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zay5775

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for all my makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of taking 2-3 bags with my makeup & brushes and looking for things all over the place ..now its sooooo much more organized, I don’t have to scramble everywhere. Most of my makeup that I use are in one place. I love how thick it is & how spacious it is. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baffles (seperators) do not stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: There are several things I love about this case. Its is a great size, well organized, functional. However, I have to give it only 2 stars because the baffles never stay in place. They are constantly coming out, moving and my items don't stay in place. The entire reason for the purchase was to keep things organized and if the baffles dont then the bag does not do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette S

customer_reviews.title: Durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love!!!! I have tried and ungodly amount of makeup bags and all of them never hold up for very long and majority of the time I don’t feel as if my makeup is organized or safe for traveling. This is hands down worth every penny I’ll never buy another makeup case this one is durable, helps me keep my makeup organized, and I feel it’s all protected. YOU WONT REGRET IT
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travel, Not for carrying Hair Care products
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I need, that is why I only gave the bag four stars. The main box is able to be manipulated to different sizes to fit different objects, which helps, but I have 4 oz. bottles that won't fit. I bought this to carry hair care products. I was hoping for something bigger, But not so big as to interfere with my ability to walk (I use crutches). All in all I give this bag 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Burgandy540

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This seems sturdy and it it nice that you can move the partitions but they always pop out and everything runs together and the brushes fall out since the holder for them is at a downward slant when you open the case. I am now looking for a different bag/case
customer_reviews.author: it should be worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for travel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Great for makeup, jewelry, perfume or anything else that you’d like to have in a safe and sturdy place. The inside is adjustable and it’s perfect for travel. I had this in my checked back on 4 flights two and from Europe and nothing moved.
customer_reviews.author: Matty🚒

customer_reviews.title: please see comment
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this much beside storing makeup but the inside is versatile with interchangable compartments and is actually pretty big. I can fit most of my makeup i'd be using for a drag show or event with room to spare for removing wipes, tweezers and just about anything else you could want for a makeup bag
customer_reviews.author: Bosgo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this case will be great but it arrived with one of the dividers completely unglued from itself. I might expect something like this to happen over time, but upon arrival? Really?! I glued it back together with some E6000 so hopefully it sticks & I can use this case to its full potential.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Is this what you used to carry when you rode the train?
customer_reviews.text: This case showed up as a "lightning deal", and looked like the perfect gift for a teenager with a full obsession with makeup. It seems it was also desirable to the mother of such a teen. Purchased this one, the order ran as promised, and delivered on time. Now, I have to find one for mom.
customer_reviews.author: jay watkins

customer_reviews.title: SO PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this thing! I travel quite a bit and have tried so many different make up bags. This is durable, great quality, and so functional. When I tell you I can fit my whole routine in here I mean it! I can fit all of my make-up, a TON of brushes, all of my travel size face wash/moisturizer/hairspray/setting spray/ toothbrush/ toothpaste and whatever else little extras I need. My whole bathroom routine fits! And it all zips up and stays out of my way. I will never own another make up bag after this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my makeup in for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel case! It fits all my makeup in when I travel. I was able to fit a couple small eyeshadow palettes too! I love that it has dividers so you can customize to how you want your makeup to fit in. It kept everything nice and snug so nothing rolled around, and I didn't have to worry about anything breaking in it. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great make up bag
customer_reviews.text: Got this to hold all of my makeup and it works great. It's sturdy and durable so when traveling if it gets tossed around I'm not worries about my makeup breaking. Has plenty of room and also has pockets for the brushes and also a zipper pocket. The dividers come apart so you can make the different size compartments however you would like. Highly reccomend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Travelmall
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup travel mall it is sooooooo big and roomy. It holds all of my stuff and I love that the department are expandable. The pockets are deep and it has three compartment to store more things. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Renetta Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect makeup case.
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup case, it holds all my makeup products with convenient access. It sits nicely on my makeup table without taking up too much space. I travel quite a bit and I never have to pick and choose which products I want to take with me I just zip up and go, plus the sturdy design keeps the items from breaking or getting squished. I love it so much that I bought one for my daughter who absolutely loves hers too.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything you need for complete skin care and makeup
customer_reviews.text: High quality holds a lot of makeup. I was able to pack 3 blush, 4 eyeshadow, 2 facial serum, eye cream, day cream, sharpener, 10 lipsticks, powder, eyeliner, eyebrow pencil, foundation primer, sponge, 3 brushes, tweezers and there was still a little more room. The compartments are adjustable and the case is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: dena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little case
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made for the money. Great design, with the reconfigurable interior, but you can only do so much as the pieces are of fixed length. Bought this for my lady and she genuinely appreciates it, and I genuinely appreciate that now all of her supplies aren't strewn about on the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: I insist that you buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I ever bought I love it so much it has so many great compartments that fit all of my make up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It is what you see
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travelling, or just keeping your current rotation out of the way. I wish I would have gotten her a bigger one, because she feel off the makeup deep end. But she loves it, and shes happy and this thing saves a lot of time and frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup case for travel! It keeps everything nice and organized. I love that you can move the dividers around to fit your items and keep them from moving or getting busted. I like that the exterior is firm so your makeup doesn't get smashed. I would have given 5 stars but some of my taller Sigma brushes would not fit it in top part under the flap that is made for brushes. I ended up putting lip glosses, mascara, brow pencils, etc there which gave me more room in the bigger part.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to organize your makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I had a case similar to this from Sephora and I love it. Unfortunately, I used it until it fell apart and had a hard time finding another one that was similar. This one is nice with the separate compartments. That lets you organize your makeup which makes it easier to find. My only complaint is that it is pretty stiff.
customer_reviews.author: waww

customer_reviews.title: Dividers get loose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could more easily transport my makeup. I love the brush organizer, handle, and dividers! The reason I am giving it 3 stars is that after 2 weeks the only divider that now stays in place is the long one. The other dividers move around, which doesn't keep my makeup organized.
customer_reviews.author: RCJH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Should I have known that this existed I would have purchased it a long time ago. It made organizing my makeup so much easier. I took it to PR and my niece loved it. Now she wants one lol and yes, it’s pretty sturdy. I was very impressed. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: KR

product_meta.title: Relavel Travel Makeup Train Case Makeup Cosmetic Case Organizer Portable Artist Storage Bag with Adjustable Dividers for Cosmetics Makeup Brushes Toiletry Jewelry Digital Accessories Black
feature_bullets: PREMIUM MATERIAL: This Makeup Bag is made of high quality Oxford Fabric, Lining-nylon. (Note: Cosmetic Accessories Not included).

PLENTY OF STORAGE SPACE: This Makeup Bag have enough space to storage your makeup and cosmetic accessories, like lipstick, lip gloss, makeup brushes, eyeshadow, makeup palettes, hairbrushes, skin care products, nail polish, nail art tools, shampoo and so no.

ADJUSTABLE COMPARTMENTS: This Makeup Bag have several compartments and makeup brushes slots, you can keep your makeup tools is neat and tidy. Special design adjustable compartments, you can adjust as needed.
PERFECT TRAVEL MAKEUP CASE: Portable and Lightweight design, with waterproof, shockproof, anti-wear and spill-proof interiors. You can bring your cosmetics to anywhere.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL MAKEUP BAG: This Makeup Bag not only can storage your cosmetics, but also Jewelry, Electronic Accessories, Camera, Essential oil, Toiletries, Shaving Kit, Valuable objects and so on.
